News.headline: Football Weekend At The Daggers
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed weekend of football at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
The Daggers bar will show West Ham's trip to London rivals Tottenham Hotspur at White Hart Lane, who are unbeaten in the league so far this season, which kicks off at 5:30pm on Saturday.

Football Sundays will be back between 1:00-7:00pm on Sunday with a fixture each from the Championship and the Premier League. Championship table toppers Newcastle United travel to Leeds United at 1:15pm, before Middlesbrough host Chelsea at the Riverside Stadium which kicks off at 4:00pm.

Take advantage of the Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg. Please note that these offers are for the Sunday only.

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
